project.name: Sports Academy Inventory System
project.description: A high-performance, professional inventory management dashboard for sports academies.
project.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Clarity for Data) with High-Contrast Dark Mode Option

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Key metrics

body.usage: Table data, Form labels, General text

accent.name: Energetic Orange
accent.usage: Call to Actions, Active States, Highlights

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (280px), collapsible on mobile. Dark theme by default for contrast.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800), no shadow by default. Hover: shadow-lg and slight lift.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-lg font-semibold px-6 py-2.5 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.accent: bg-orange-500 text-white hover:bg-orange-600 rounded-lg font-bold shadow-md hover:shadow-orange-500/20

inputs.style: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500/20 focus:border-orange-500 rounded-lg h-11

tables.style: Clean rows, generous padding (py-4). Header: uppercase, text-xs, tracking-wider, text-slate-500.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the sidebar to reduce flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: layered shadows for modals and dropdowns: shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.12)]
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are preferred over shadows for separation.

motion.hover_effects: scale-[1.01] for cards, brightness-110 for buttons

login_hero.description: Boxing gym atmosphere, energetic and focused. Use for Login page background.

dashboard_banner.description: Abstract court lines. Use for dashboard header background or welcome card.

empty_state_facility.description: Empty volleyball court. Use for 'No Facilities Found' state.

equipment_placeholder.description: Soccer ball. Use as default placeholder for equipment without images.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Athletic Precision' theme. Keep it clean, organized, and data-dense but legible.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Implement a Bento Grid layout. Use the 'dashboard_banner' image as a subtle background for the welcome section.
instructions_to_main_agent.tables: This is an inventory system. Tables are the core. Make them beautiful. Use 'Manrope' font. Add status badges (pill shaped) for item condition.
instructions_to_main_agent.forms: Use Shadcn Form components. Customize them to match the 'Deep Navy' and 'Orange' palette.
instructions_to_main_agent.pdf_generation: Ensure the PDF templates match the corporate identity (Logo, Fonts, Colors).
instructions_to_main_agent.audit_log: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for the audit log data to make it look technical and precise.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
